mapper.select: select CASE ORDER_TYPE WHEN 100777 THEN '1' WHEN 100778 THEN '2' WHEN 100885 THEN '3' END from mind_order where order_num = #{orderNum}

select a.EVAL_SEQ AS evalSeq, a.ITEM_SEQ AS itemSeq, a.ITEM_NO AS itemNo, a.ITEM_TITLE AS itemTitle, a.ITEM_TYPE AS itemType, a.ITEM_LIMIT AS itemLimit, a.ITEM_YN AS itemYn, b.ITEM_ANS AS itemAns, b.TARGET_SEQ AS targetSeq, b.EVAL_USER_SEQ AS evalUserSeq, (select eval_title from mind_evaluation where eval_seq = a.eval_seq) as evalTitle from (select * from mind_evaluation_item where eval_seq = #{evalSeq} and item_yn = 'Y') as a left join mind_evaluation_user as b on a.EVAL_SEQ = b.EVAL_SEQ and a.item_seq = b.ITEM_SEQ and b.TARGET_SEQ = #{orderNum} where 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MIND_EVALUATION_USER ( EVAL_SEQ, TARGET_SEQ, ITEM_SEQ, USER_KEY, ITEM_ANS, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{evalSeq}, #{targetSeq}, #{itemSeq}, #{userKey}, #{itemAns}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') )
mapper.update: UPDATE mind_evaluation_user SET SEARCH_YN = #{showYn}, SEARCH_ID = #{userId}, SEARCH_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') where 1=1 and target_seq = #{targetSeq} and eval_seq = #{evalSeq}
